GoodieHutType.Name: Crystal Crag
GoodieHutType.Description: An outcrop of glistening minerals, beyond which a dark cavern beckons.

Treasure.Title: Item Discovered!
Treasure.Desc: In the Ophidian's lair you find finely-crafted vambraces - a master smith's final "on-site" creation.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Demons
GoodieHutType.Description: A foul stench fills the air; the rocks and stones themselves seem to radiate evil.

Treasure.Title: Item Discovered!
Treasure.Desc: In the demon's lair you find the sword of a champion who fought his last battle here.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Demons
GoodieHutType.Description: A foul stench fills the air; the rocks and stones themselves seem to radiate evil.

GoodieHutType.Name: Vas Norga
GoodieHutType.Description: A small port city, open to man and Fallen alike.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Village of Ammarkan
GoodieHutType.Description: Armor lies scattered on the road leading to the town gate, every piece of it broken, and burned. Shattered swords, and savaged saddlebags can be seen as well... from somewhere ahead comes the sound of cruel, mocking laughter...

GoodieHutType.Name: The Village of Ammarkan
GoodieHutType.Description: Armor lies scattered on the road leading to the town gate, every piece of it broken, and burned. Shattered swords, and savaged saddlebags can be seen as well... from somewhere ahead comes the sound of cruel, mocking laughter...

GoodieHutType.Name: Kroyer's Hold
GoodieHutType.Description: A circle of devastation surrounds a shattered fortress; a dead horse lies near a great crater in the middle of the road, flies buzzing around it. Smoke rises from the ruins of the citadel.

GoodieHutType.Name: Kroyer's Hold
GoodieHutType.Description: A circle of devastation surrounds a shattered fortress; a dead horse lies near a great crater in the middle of the road, flies buzzing around it. Smoke rises from the ruins of the citadel.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Village of Bruka
GoodieHutType.Description: The ground here is scorched and blackened; a massive stone wall has been toppled, and breached. In the distance, you can hear screaming...

GoodieHutType.Name: The Village of Bruka
GoodieHutType.Description: The ground here is scorched and blackened; a massive stone wall has been toppled, and breached. In the distance, you can hear screaming...

GoodieHutType.Name: The Village of Syraius
GoodieHutType.Description: The remnants of a once-prosperous Urxen town. Seemingly uninhabited, and lifeless... though there are tracks leading to its breached gate...

GoodieHutType.Name: Hashaini Settlement
GoodieHutType.Description: A camp of thieves; a safe harbor for all Hashaini in this region.

Treasure.Title: Item Discovered!
Treasure.Desc: Around the bandit captain's neck you find a makeshift necklace with a ring strung upon it.

GoodieHutType.Name: Raz Golka
GoodieHutType.Description: Infamous prisoner camp of the Tazzars; now occupied by the Krax, whose flags fly over the camp's crude huts.

Treasure.Title: Item Discovered!
Treasure.Desc: In the Krax camp you find a compass - handy for navigation.

GoodieHutType.Name: Raz Golka
GoodieHutType.Description: Infamous prisoner camp of the Tazzars; now occupied by the Krax, whose flags fly over the camp's crude huts.

GoodieHutType.Name: Camp of the Krax
GoodieHutType.Description: A company of soldiers have set up shelters here. Above their makeshift huts flies the flag of Karavox, so-called 'Emperor' of the Krax.

GoodieHutType.Name: Camp of the Krax
GoodieHutType.Description: A company of soldiers have set up shelters here. Above their makeshift huts flies the flag of Karavox, so-called 'Emperor' of the Krax.

GoodieHutType.Name: Kos Piatra
GoodieHutType.Description: A miraculous sight, in the midst of all this devastation. A city whose walls who have not been breached, where inns and merchants remain - for the moment - open for business.

GoodieHutType.Name: Kos Piatra
GoodieHutType.Description: A miraculous sight, in the midst of all this devastation. A city whose walls who have not been breached, where inns and merchants remain - for the moment - open for business.

GoodieHutType.Name: Crypt of the Tazzars
GoodieHutType.Description: Within lie the bodies of those who ruled Kos Piatra - the Tazzars of old, many of whom were rumored to dabble in dark magics.

GoodieHutType.Name: Crypt of the Tazzars
GoodieHutType.Description: Within lie the bodies of those who ruled Kos Piatra - the Tazzars of old, many of whom were rumored to dabble in dark magics.

GoodieHutType.Name: Baruud Ma
GoodieHutType.Description: A monastery settled long ago by the Padars of Anthuane; those who worship the five elemental lords of old.

GoodieHutType.Name: Baruud Ma
GoodieHutType.Description: A monastery settled long ago by the Padars of Anthuane; those who worship the five elemental lords of old.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Simple Hut
GoodieHutType.Description: In a clearing atop a rocky plateau stands a shelter of wood and stone.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Simple Hut
GoodieHutType.Description: In a clearing atop a rocky plateau stands a shelter of wood and stone.

GoodieHutType.Name: Norga Krem
GoodieHutType.Description: A fortress, filled with Karavox's soldiers... warriors of the army of the Krax.

Treasure.Title: Item Discovered!
Treasure.Desc: In the fortress you find two healing potions, which you quickly put into your bag.

GoodieHutType.Name: Norga Krem
GoodieHutType.Description: A fortress, filled with Karavox's soldiers... warriors of the army of the Krax.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Wilding Settlement
GoodieHutType.Description: A primitive village; home to a tribe of these desert warriors.

Treasure.Title: Item Discovered!
Treasure.Desc: In the Wilding village you find some strange but seemingly effective healing herbs.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Wilding Settlement
GoodieHutType.Description: A primitive village; home to a tribe of these desert warriors.

Treasure.Title: Item Discovered!
Treasure.Desc: In the Wilding village you find some strange but seemingly effective healing herbs.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Wilding Settlement
GoodieHutType.Description: A primitive village; home to a tribe of these desert warriors.

Treasure.Title: Item Discovered!
Treasure.Desc: In the Wilding village you find some strange but seemingly effective healing herbs.

GoodieHutType.Name: Earth Elemental Sanctum
GoodieHutType.Description: Here stands a clearing, surrounded by a ring of dead trees. In the center of that ring, standing knee-deep in the deep, fetid loam of the forest, waits a creature out of legend.

Treasure.Title: Item Discovered!
Treasure.Desc: Wedged into a crack on the elemental's back you find a mysterious flute.

GoodieHutType.Name: Krax Army Base
GoodieHutType.Description: The flags of Kraxis - of the traitor Karavox - fly over this formidable-looking encampment.

GoodieHutType.Name: Krax Army Base
GoodieHutType.Description: The flags of Kraxis - of the traitor Karavox - fly over this formidable-looking encampment.

GoodieHutType.Name: Krax Army Base
GoodieHutType.Description: The flags of Kraxis - of the traitor Karavox - fly over this formidable-looking encampment.

GoodieHutType.Name: Krax Army Base
GoodieHutType.Description: The flags of Kraxis - of the traitor Karavox - fly over this formidable-looking encampment.

GoodieHutType.Name: Krax Army Base
GoodieHutType.Description: The flags of Kraxis - of the traitor Karavox - fly over this formidable-looking encampment.

GoodieHutType.Name: Krax Army Base
GoodieHutType.Description: The flags of Kraxis - of the traitor Karavox - fly over this formidable-looking encampment.

GoodieHutType.Name: Warriors of the Enchantress
GoodieHutType.Description: The tents and training-grounds of this camp are filled with Ceresa's minions - those transformed by the power of the Stone into Wraiths.

GoodieHutType.Name: Warriors of the Enchantress
GoodieHutType.Description: The tents and training-grounds of this camp are filled with Ceresa's minions - those transformed by the power of the Stone into Wraiths.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Army of Wraith
GoodieHutType.Description: The tents and training-grounds of this camp are filled with Ceresa's minions - those transformed by the power of the Stone into Wraiths.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Army of Wraith
GoodieHutType.Description: The tents and training-grounds of this camp are filled with Ceresa's minions - those transformed by the power of the Stone into Wraiths.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Deserted Homestead
GoodieHutType.Description: Here stands an immaculate - but uninhabited - house, alongside an empty blacksmith's forge.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Deserted Homestead
GoodieHutType.Description: Here stands an immaculate - but uninhabited - house, alongside an empty blacksmith's forge.

Treasure.Title: Item Discovered!
Treasure.Desc: In the blacksmith's hut you find your reward - the Doom Hammer, an incredibly powerful weapon.

GameItemType.Description: Bandit's Bandana, he will have little use for this now. (Quest Item)

GoodieHutType.Name: Stone Archway
GoodieHutType.Description: An unusual rock formation - a natural landmark in the wilderness...

QuestDef.Description:
You are enjoying a moment's rest - a brief respite from the trials of your journey - when a man steps into view, and strides toward your camp. Ferensu and Rihossa hurriedly get to their feet, raising their weapons. Dariun looks on, remaining seated.
"At your ease, warriors. My name is Cowan Remanna, and I mean ye no harm. None of ye." From the pack he carries then man draws a battleaxe, which he lays down gently on the ground before you.
Dariun rises to his feet and steps forward. "A fine weapon," he says, examining the axe. "Well-crafted."
"You'll find no better," the man says. "I forged it myself, sir, with tools from the time before this one. Tools belonging to the Aivern themselves. I'll give you that axe and more, if you clear the Green Men from this land."
"The Green Men?" you ask. "Who?"
"Thieves, my Lord. A pack of them. Dressed in vests of green. They threaten my home. My family. My forge. I ask for your assistance sir, in fighting them." More thieves. Always with the thieves. Doesn't anyone here make an honest living?
Dariun speaks. "My lord, it's our duty to help the people who are unable to defend themselves. I ask that you consider his request, although I'll understand if you decide against it."
QuestDef.ShortTextAccept: We will aid you in your fight, Cowen Remanna.
QuestDef.ShortTextDeny: Keep your weapon, Cowen. We cannot assist you.
QuestDef.SuccessText:
As you turn from the battlefield, and the last of your fallen foes, Remanna steps forward.
"I thank you, Lord," the blacksmith says. "You kept your word, and vanquished the Green Men. And now I'll keep mine. My forge is located southwest of here, near a stone archway; journey there, and you will find the reward I promised you."

Objective.Text: Find and defeat the Green Men, and Remanna will reward you.

QuestConditionDef.CannotCompleteText: You have not finished your task; the Green Men remain a threat to this land.

QuestLocationType.Name: Rockfall
QuestLocationType.Description: Massive boulders, a natural hiding place, behind which a single form can be seen pacing, anxiously...

GoodieHutType.Name: Rockfall
GoodieHutType.Description: Massive boulders, a natural hiding place, behind which a single form can be seen pacing, anxiously...

QuestDef.Description: You come accross an old raggidy tent with a dark figure inside.
QuestDef.ShortTextDeny: Ignore it and keep to yourself.
QuestDef.SuccessText: Ruga - as you expected - was not interested in returning to Bruznii with you to face justice. He fought. He died. You rip the medallion from his neck, and take it to give it to Brugnaddin on your return to the village, in lieu of returning with the killer himself..

QuestObjectiveDef.Description:
A man emerges from the camp before you; he wears the medallion Brugnaddin described to you, with the image of Goran Vakul upon it.
"I am Ivann Ruga," he says. "You look for me?"
"Yes." You step forward. "I come from Ilza Brugnaddin. She says - "
"Yes - I killed her brother." Ruga shrugs. "But it was self-defense. He tried to steal my horse. I hit him - like so - he fell to ground, came up holding knife. I had no choice."
You meet the man's eyes. It is hard to read, exactly, what you see there. "If you're innocent," you ask, "then why did you run?"
"Brugnaddin is formidable woman," he says. "With much money. She wants me dead, if I stay in Bruznii, I am dead. So I leave. I knew she would send someone after me - I am impressed, though, you find me so soon."
QuestObjectiveDef.ChoiceText:
A man emerges from the camp before you; he wears the medallion Brugnaddin described to you, with the image of Goran Vakul upon it.
"I am Ivann Ruga," he says. "You look for me?"
"Yes." You step forward. "I come from Ilza Brugnaddin. She says - "
"Yes - I killed her brother." Ruga shrugs. "But it was self-defense. He tried to steal my horse. I hit him - like so - he fell to ground, came up holding knife. I had no choice."
You meet the man's eyes. It is hard to read, exactly, what you see there. "If you're innocent," you ask, "then why did you run?"
"Brugnaddin is formidable woman," he says. "With much money. She wants me dead, if I stay in Bruznii, I am dead. So I leave. I knew she would send someone after me - I am impressed, though, you find me so soon."

QuestChoiceDef.Description: Come with us, Ruga. Justice awaits.
Fine, I'll let you go. You would do well to travel fast, and far.
I'll come back later if I'm interested

QuestConditionDef.Description:
You tell Ruga to flee; instead, he stands before you a moment, a puzzled look across his face.
"You do not take me back to Bruznii?" he asks. "You believe Ruga?"
"I do. Now go, before I change my mind."
"It has been a long time since someone has taken Ruga's word. I thank you." The man bows his head, and then, to your astonishment, he goes down on one knee. "Now Ruga pledges you his service, Lord Relias. From this moment forward, until day he dies."
It seems your compassion has won you a new loyal companion.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Traveler's Campsite
GoodieHutType.Description: A small Camp site.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Small Village
GoodieHutType.Description: A small group if people call this village home.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Small Village
GoodieHutType.Description: A small group if people call this village home.

GameItemType.Description: The Fugitive's Lucky Medallion, he will have little use for this now. (Quest Item)

GoodieHutType.Name: Cemetery of the Fallen
GoodieHutType.Description: Armor of surpassing quality, engraved with the staff and the sword - the seal of the Dunnadar, Padar Janos's companions. Take these for your own.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Armor of surpassing quality, engraved with the staff and the sword - the seal of the Dunnadar, Padar Janos's companions. Take these for your own.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Armor of surpassing quality, engraved with the staff and the sword - the seal of the Dunnadar, Padar Janos's companions. Take these for your own.

GoodieHutType.Name: Shrine To Annerys
GoodieHutType.Description: The runes on the toppled buildings of this sanctuary identify it as a shrine to Annerys - the long-vanished Elemental Lady of Rivers.

Treasure.Title: The Lady's Cloak
Treasure.Desc: A cloak granting the wearer additional protection from enchantments of all types.

Treasure.Title: Sword of the Golem
Treasure.Desc: An army of golems once protected Annerys's shrine; this ancient weapon belonged to one of them.

GoodieHutType.Name: Kos Parada
GoodieHutType.Description: The ruins of one of the ancient world's great cities.

Treasure.Title: The Tazzar's Cape
Treasure.Desc: The same cataclysm that toppled the city walls has exposed a hidden chamber, containing this powerful artifact.

Treasure.Title: Token of the Nerazga
Treasure.Desc: An ancient talisman; a boon to any who enter combat wearing it.

GoodieHutType.Name: Temple of the Sions
GoodieHutType.Description: Both sanctuary and training grounds, this temple was home to the Sions who in the time before this one formed an important part of Curgen's army.

Treasure.Title: The Sions Boon
Treasure.Desc: An enchanted potion; whomsoever drinks of it will be gifted with great speed, similar to that breed of Sions known as Edars.

Treasure.Title: Scimitar of the D'Rog
Treasure.Desc: A fearsome weapon, favored by the Fallen for many training drills.

GoodieHutType.Name: Abandoned Mine
GoodieHutType.Description: The entrance to this long-abandoned mine bears the seal of ancient Hallas, the eldest of the great kingdoms of mankind.

Treasure.Title: Abandoned Ore
Treasure.Desc: Under a toppled cart, you find a treasure trove of usable ore - metal mined by the Veladrii of long ago.

Treasure.Title: Burning Sword
Treasure.Desc: Pry this fine weapon from the grasp of the skeleton that holds it.
